channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- i Access for Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- i Access for Windows

item.title: CVE-2018-1888|2024-08-05T04:14:38.800Z -- ibm -- i%20access%20for%20windows
item.description: An untrusted search path vulnerability in IBM i Access for Windows versions 7.1 and earlier on Windows can allow arbitrary code execution via a Trojan horse DLL in the current working directory, related to use of the LoadLibrary function. IBM X-Force ID: 152079.
